alert.note: Alert for Brazoria; Galveston (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued May 24 at 9:58AM CDT until May 24 at 10:15AM CDT by NWS Houston - Galveston
info.description: The National Weather Service in League City has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Southwestern Galveston County in southeastern Texas... East central Brazoria County in southeastern Texas... * Until 1015 AM CDT. * At 958 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Liverpool, or near Santa Fe, moving north at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Galveston Island West End, Alvin, Santa Fe, Hitchcock, Danbury, Hillcrest, Liverpool and Chocolate Bayou. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
